about_the_game:
DLC - Love Puzzle

This is DLC for casual, intellectual, minimalist puzzle game. Control your square and find the way to pass the level.
DLC contain a few images and animations with the girls. All characters are over 18 years old.
DLC also has very smooth and nice animations.
The DLC includes some character nudity or sexual behavior.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
All characters are over 18 years old
The game includes some character nudity or sexual behavior.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gigabyte PCI-ex GeForce GT 710
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
